title: Testing - File write
instructions: Just run the default program to check for expected behaviour.
starter:
# this should open a file tab
with open("names.txt", "w") as f:
    for name in ["Bob", "Douglas", "Susan", "Jemima"]:
        f.write(f"{name}\n")
print("Done")

files./main.py:
# this should open a file tab
with open("names.txt", "w") as f:
    for name in ["Bob", "Douglas", "Susan", "Jemima"]:
        f.write(f"{name}\n")
print("Done")
